pages.text: Manipulations with wood have borne fruit - a well-conducting and resonant $(l:infusing/inert_poison_staff)material$() has been obtained, ready to serve as the basis for creating a magical staff. Such a staff was once possessed by Flemeth, a renowned witch of the Wildlands, and detailed notes about this ritual, capable of transforming a dry dead branch into a $(l:artifacts/flemeth_cane)powerful staff$(), were found in her grimoire.
